title: Bug with IP...
body: Im farming IP to buy new char and i get some bug, it show more ip than i really got on my account, when i relog to clients my ip drop down.

replies.body: I have the same issue except that sometimes it displays a number below (rather than above) the current IP I have. Also the number is random. Very annoying because I am so happy I got the new champ, then it says I cant buy it even though it displays the correct amount of IP. This works inversely as well because the bug seems to show I have less IP than I actually have so I can sometimes purchase things when it seems that I can't.

*Lew* is correct, this is a fairly uncommon bug that happens specifically on the Beta Client. You can swap over to the Legacy Client from the login screen to visit the store and resolve your IP balance issue across both clients:

https://i.imgur.com/drrzBd9.png

Let me know if this worked~
That is a known bug but if you switch back tot the old client it should fix your IP display.
